name: TaxRate
comment: Maintains the tax rates for internal tax calculations. The tax rate is maintained for each tax type such as, 11% for VAT, 10% for GST and so on, as well as tax authorities linked to the tax code and tax rule. The tax rate is a reference table and it contains historical data as well (past tax rates).
vf short description: Maintains the tax rates for internal tax calculations. The tax rate is maintained for each tax type such as, 11% for VAT, 10% for GST and so on, as well as tax authorities linked to the tax code and tax rule.

fields.name: TaxRateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: TaxRateKey
fields.comment: Indicates the tax rate Generated Key. //CES:TX1_TAX_RATE.TAX_RATE_SEQ//Generated Key on Tax Rate Id//Optima:Generated key based on Tax Rate Id,Tenant Id,Billing Frequency, Currency Code,Effective Date,Maximum Tax Amount

fields.name: TaxCodeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: TaxRuleCode
fields.comment: Indicates the tax rule code. TX1_TAX_RATE.RULE_CODE

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date from which the tax rate is applicable. //CES:TX1_TAX_RATE.EFFECTIVE_DATE//Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.ACTIVE_DATE

fields.name: ExpirationDate
fields.comment: Specifies the expiration date till which this tax rate is applicable. //CES:TX1_TAX_RATE.EXPIRATION_DATE//Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.INACTIVE_DATE

fields.name: TaxTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: TaxAuthorityCode
fields.comment: Indicates the tax authority such as Country and State. TX1_TAX_RATE.TAX_AUTHORITY

fields.name: TaxRate
fields.comment: Actual rate of the tax. //CES:TX1_TAX_RATE.TAX_RATE//Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.RATE

fields.name: TaxRateId
fields.comment: Indicates a unique sequence for the tax rate from the source. //CES:TX1_TAX_RATE.TAX_RATE_SEQ//Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.TAX_PKG_INST_ID

fields.name: MaximumTaxAmount
fields.comment: Indicates Ceiling of range to which tax can be applied //Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.RANGE_TERMINUS

fields.name: CurrencySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: TaxClassCode
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the tax class, use 0 if only a single tax rate applies for each tax package. //Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.TAX_CLASS

fields.name: BillingFrequency
fields.comment: Billing frequency associated with tax rate. //Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.BILLING_FREQUENCY

fields.name: FixedTaxAmount
fields.comment: Fixed amount of tax, if any. //Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.FIXED_AMT

fields.name: TenantId
fields.comment: Unique internal identifier for tenant from source. //Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.TENANT_ID

fields.name: CurrencyCode
fields.comment: Indcates the Currency code. //Optima:TAX_RATES_VAT.CURRENCY_CODE

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
